Class E6Thread

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.CommThread<E6Property>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.e6.E6Thread
public class E6Thread extends CommThread<E6Property>
A thread to communicate with TransCore E6 tag readers.
Author:
Douglas Lau

      protected Messenger createMessenger(URI s, String u, int rt, int nrd) throws MessengerException
      Create a messenger.
      Overrides:
      createMessenger in class CommThread<E6Property>
      Parameters:
      s - Default URI scheme.
      u - The URI.
      rt - Receive timeout (ms).
      nrd - No-response disconnect (sec).
      Returns:
      The new messenger.
      Throws:
      MessengerException - if the messenger could not be created.
